name: Spearman
description: The spearman fights on the frontline of the battlefield engaging in swift combat with his spear.

attacks.name: Piercing Thrust
attacks.description: A quick jab to penetrate the enemy's defense.

attacks.name: Precision Strike
attacks.description: A carefully aimed thrust designed to exploit weaknesses in armor.

attacks.name: Spear Sweep
attacks.description: A sweeping strike that cuts through foes.

attacks.name: Rapid Strikes
attacks.description: A flurry of rapid thrusts and sweeps.

attacks.name: Spear Barrage
attacks.description: A full-out assault with the spear, combining piercing and slashing attacks.

name: Shieldman
description: The shieldman is a fierce warrior using his massive shield to fend off incoming attacks.

attacks.name: Shield Bash
attacks.description: A direct hit with the shield to destabilize the enemy.

attacks.name: Hammer Blow
attacks.description: A heavy strike with a hammer or mace.

attacks.name: Sword Stab
attacks.description: A sudden sword thrust targeting unprotected areas.

attacks.name: Combat Rush
attacks.description: A combination of shield bashes and weapon strikes.

attacks.name: Defensive Onslaught
attacks.description: A powerful combination of shield and weapon attacks, maximizing blunt and piercing damage.

name: Archer
description: The archer uses its powerfull bow to strike with devastating precision.

attacks.name: Multi Shot
attacks.description: Release multiple arrows at once to cover a wide area.

attacks.name: Cutting Arrow
attacks.description: A shot with a specially-designed broadhead arrow for cutting.

attacks.name: Knife Slash
attacks.description: A quick slash with a hunting knife.

attacks.name: Arrow Storm
attacks.description: A rain of arrows, combining piercing and slashing attacks.
